meanings.definition: The action or process of rotating.
meanings.sent1: During the dance performance, the ballet dancers executed graceful rotations on stage.
meanings.sent2: The Earth completes one full rotation on its axis every 24 hours.
meanings.sent3: The rotating door at the entrance of the building made everyone feel like they were in a revolving circus!
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to stand still as the carousel of life continued its rotations.
meanings.sent5: The rotations of the windmill blades created a mesmerizing pattern against the sky.

meanings.definition: A single complete turn around an axis or a point.
meanings.sent1: The gymnast performed multiple rotations in the air before landing perfectly on the mat.
meanings.sent2: The bicycle wheel made several rotations before coming to a stop.
meanings.sent3: The merry-go-round's rotations made the children giggle with delight.
meanings.sent4: The record player's rotations brought the music to life in the room.
meanings.sent5: The key made a satisfying click after a few rotations in the lock.
